products or services, as well as through its business relationships. This includes all workers
who are not included in the scope of “own workforce” (“own workforce” includes employees,
individual contractors, i.e., self- employed workers, and workers provided by third party
undertakings primarily engaged in ‘employment activities’). Own workforce is covered in
ESRS S1 Own workforce. See AR 3 for examples of what is included in the scope of this
Standard.
